Fork me on Github == git@tigefa4u

gem install jekyll Visite full documentation Jekyllrb.com

git clone git@github.com:tigefa4u/tigefa4u.github.io.git

cd tigefa4u.github.io

jekyll build

jekyll serve

visite http://localhost:4000

Comments

Download Jekyll

Jekyll's awesome website. Jekyll is a simple, blog aware, static site generator. It takes a template directory (representing the raw form of a website), runs it through Textile or Markdown and Liquid converters, and spits out a complete, static website suitable for serving with Apache or your favorite web server. This is also the engine behind "GitHub Pages":http://pages.github.com, which you can use to host your project's page or blog right here from GitHub.

Download Jekyll

Download Bootstrap

Get the original files for all CSS and JavaScript, along with a local copy of the docs by downloading the latest version directly from GitHub.

Download Bootstrap source

Image Thumb

Explore all your options with the various grid classes available to you. You can also mix and match different sizes.
